law.catch_line: Prohibition against transacting business before issuance of charter.
law.text: An institution shall not transact any business, except business which is incidental or preliminarily necessary to its organization, until it has been issued a charter under KRS 286.3-020.
law.history: Created 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 28, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2010.
